xml.data:
Home » 39P4 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4) » 8 Tika, Saraṇaduka » 8.2 Vedanāttika, Saraṇaduka » 8.2.1 Saraṇapada » 8.2.1.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Tika, Saraṇaduka
Vedanāttika, Saraṇaduka
Saraṇapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
1.
1708Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
1709Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
1710Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
2.
1711Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1712(Sahajātavārampi…pe…  sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)
3.
1713Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto saraṇo dhammo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa saraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
1714Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto saraṇo dhammo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa saraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
1715Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto saraṇo dhammo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa saraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
4.
1716Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare…pe…  nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
